00020 #ifndef H_SENSORDATA
00021 #define H_SENSORDATA
00022 
00023 #include <string>
00024 #include <rdkcore/time/time.h>
00025 #include <rdkcore/geometry/point.h>
00026 
00027 namespace RDK2 { namespace SensorData {
00028 
00029 using namespace RDK2::Time;
00030 using namespace RDK2::Geometry;
00031 
00032 struct Parser;
00033 
00034 struct BaseSensorData {
00035     const std::string logtag;
00036     std::string tag;    // DEPRECATED
00037     
00038     Timestamp timestamp;
00039     std::string sensorName;
00040     std::string ipc_hostname;
00041     Timestamp ipc_timestamp;
00042 
00043     Point2od odometryPose;  //< odometry pose when the data has been taken (OF THE SENSOR, NOT OF THE ROBOT)
00044     Point2od estimatedPose; //< estimated pose when the data has been taken (OF THE SENSOR, NOT OF THE ROBOT)
00045 
00046     BaseSensorData(const std::string& logtag = "UNKNOWN") : 
00047         logtag(logtag), odometryPose(0., 0., 0.), estimatedPose(0., 0., 0.)
00048     {
00049         ipc_timestamp = timestamp = -1;
00050         ipc_hostname = "localhost";
00051         tag = "<uninitialised>";    // DEPRECATED
00052     }
00053     virtual ~BaseSensorData() {}
00054     
00055     virtual Parser* getParser() const { return 0; }     // DEPRECATED
00056 
00057     virtual string getLogLine() const
00058     {
00059         return "ERROR I don't know how to log this sensor";
00060     }
00061     
00062     virtual bool loadFromLogLine(const string&) {
00063         return false;
00064     }
00065 };
00066 
00067 
00068 struct Unknown: public BaseSensorData {
00069     std::string line;
00070 };
00071 
00072 
00073 }}
